divs: Sighting DetailsWent to let out the dog, and saw a very bright orange light moving high above me, and eastward. Got my buddy to come see it as well, and the light had moved more to the south, and was kind of meandering around slowly. It then began to dim over about 15-20 seconds and vanished.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mattawan
There were no other sightings in Mattawan on or around August 11th 2012
